flawed_nl_solution:
On Monday, 1200/3=<<1200/3=400>>400 dollars were made.
On Tuesday, 1200/4=<<1200/4=300>>300 dollars were made.
On Wednesday, 1200-400-300=<<1200-400-300=498>>498 dollars were made.
#### 498

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 500, not 498. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
